ttfriends 0.1.0

    • Junyuan Li

    Junyuan Li

    junyuan_li.Rmd
    library(ttfriends)

    Combine groups by column

    Create example data 

    df <- data.frame(x= c("A","A","B","B","B","C"),y=c("a","b","a","a","b","a"),z=1:6)
df
#>   x y z
#> 1 A a 1
#> 2 A b 2
#> 3 B a 3
#> 4 B a 4
#> 5 B b 5
#> 6 C a 6

    Default parameter 

    table_bind_group(object = df,id = "x",col = "y")
#> # A tibble: 3 × 2
#> # Groups:   x [3]
#>   x     groups
#>   <fct> <chr> 
#> 1 A     a;b   
#> 2 B     a;b   
#> 3 C     a

    Keep the other columns 

    table_bind_group(object = df,id = "x",col = "y",keep = TRUE)
#> # A tibble: 5 × 4
#>   x     y         z groups
#>   <fct> <fct> <int> <chr> 
#> 1 A     a         1 a;b   
#> 2 A     b         2 a;b   
#> 3 B     a         3 a;b   
#> 4 B     b         5 a;b   
#> 5 C     a         6 a

    Turn off unique filter 

    table_bind_group(object = df,id = "x",col = "y",unique = FALSE)
#> # A tibble: 3 × 2
#> # Groups:   x [3]
#>   x     groups
#>   <fct> <chr> 
#> 1 A     a;b   
#> 2 B     a;a;b 
#> 3 C     a
